children.title: Prettier Module
children.description: Set a folder containing the Prettier module. If unset, the extension first tries to resolve a workspace-specific installation, or uses the bundled module if 'Prefer Bundled Prettier' is enabled. If neither is available, the bundled module will be used as a fallback.

children.title: Prefer Bundled Prettier
children.description: Use the bundled Prettier module and plugins instead of resolving from the workspace. This is ignored if a custom Prettier module path is set.

children.title: Ignore Configuration Files
children.description: Ignore external configuration files and always use the extension's configuration.

children.title: Log Debug Information
children.description: Send debug information to the Extension Console.

title: Prettier
description: Used for remote files, when no configuration file is found, or when configuration files are ignored.

children.title: Print Width
children.description: Specify the line length that the printer will wrap on.

children.title: Tab Width
children.description: Specify the number of spaces per indentation-level.

children.title: Tabs
children.description: Indent lines with tabs instead of spaces.

children.title: Semicolons
children.description: Print semicolons at the ends of statements.

children.title: Single Quotes
children.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes.

children.title: Quote Props
children.description: Change when properties in objects are quoted.

children.title: JSX Single Quotes
children.description: Use single quotes instead of double quotes in JSX.

children.title: Trailing Commas
children.description: Print trailing commas wherever possible in multi-line comma-separated syntactic structures. (A single-line array, for example, never gets trailing commas.)

children.title: Bracket Spacing
children.description: Print spaces between brackets in object literals.

children.title: Object Wrap
children.description: Configure how Prettier wraps object literals when they could fit on one line or span multiple lines.

children.title: Bracket Line
children.description: Put the > of a multi-line HTML (HTML, JSX, Vue, Angular) element at the end of the last line instead of being alone on the next line (does not apply to self closing elements).

children.title: [Deprecated] JSX Brackets
children.description: Put the > of a multi-line JSX element at the end of the last line instead of being alone on the next line (does not apply to self closing elements).

children.title: Arrow Function Parentheses
children.description: Include parentheses around a sole arrow function parameter.

children.title: Require Pragma
children.description: Prettier can restrict itself to only format files that contain a special comment, called a pragma, at the top of the file. This is very useful when gradually transitioning large, unformatted codebases to Prettier.

children.title: Insert Pragma
children.description: Prettier can insert a special @format marker at the top of files specifying that the file has been formatted with Prettier. This works well when used in tandem with the above Require Pragma option. If there is already a docblock at the top of the file then this option will add a newline to it with the @format marker.

children.title: Prose Wrap
children.description: By default, Prettier will not change wrapping in markdown text since some services use a linebreak-sensitive renderer, e.g. GitHub comments and BitBucket. To have Prettier wrap prose to the print width, change this option to "always". If you want Prettier to force all prose blocks to be on a single line and rely on editor/viewer soft wrapping instead, you can use "never".

children.title: HTML Whitespace Sensitivity
children.description: Specify the global whitespace sensitivity for HTML, Vue, Angular, and Handlebars. See Prettier documentation for more info.

children.title: Vue files script and style tags indentation
children.description: Whether or not to indent the code inside <script> and <style> tags in Vue files.

children.title: End of Line
children.description: Specifies the newline control character.

children.title: Embedded Language Formatting
children.description: Control whether Prettier formats quoted code embedded in the file.

children.title: Single Attribute Per Line
children.description: Enforce single attribute per line in HTML, Vue, and JSX.

children.title: @prettier/plugin-php
children.description: PHP formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: PHP Version
children.description: Allows specifying the PHP version you're using. If you're using PHP 7.1 or later, setting this option will make use of modern language features in the printed output. If you're using PHP lower than 7.0, you'll have to set this option or Prettier will generate incompatible code.

children.title: Trailing Commas
children.description: If set to true, trailing commas will be added wherever possible. If set to false, no trailing commas are printed.

children.title: Brace Style
children.description: If set to 'per-cs', prettier will move open brace for code blocks (classes, functions and methods) onto new line. If set to '1tbs', prettier will move open brace for code blocks (classes, functions and methods) onto same line.

children.title: @prettier/plugin-xml
children.description: XML formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Quote Attributes
children.description: Quote style for XML attributes.

children.title: Self Closing Space
children.description: Adds a space before self-closing tags.

children.title: Sort Attributes by Key
children.description: Orders XML attributes by key alphabetically while prioritizing xmlns attributes.

children.title: Whitespace Sensitivity
children.description: You may want 'ignore' or 'preserve', see the info.

children.title: prettier-plugin-sql
children.description: SQL formatter plugin for Prettier

configWorkspace.title: Plugin Status
configWorkspace.description: Select whether to use global settings, enable, or disable the plugin.

children.title: Formatter
children.description: Specifies the formatter to use for SQL code formatting.

children.title: sql-formatter
children.description: Options for sql-formatter

children.title: Language
children.description: Specifies the SQL dialect to use.

children.title: Keyword Case
children.description: Uppercases or lowercases keywords.

children.title: Data Type Case
children.description: Uppercases or lowercases data types.

children.title: Function Case
children.description: Uppercases or lowercases function names.

children.title: Identifier Case
children.description: Uppercases or lowercases identifiers. (experimental!)

children.title: Logical Operator Newline
children.description: Newline before or after boolean operator (AND, OR, XOR).

children.title: Expression Width
children.description: Maximum number of characters in parenthesized expressions to be kept on single line.

children.title: Lines Between Queries
children.description: How many newlines to insert between queries.

children.title: Dense Operators
children.description: Packs operators densely without spaces.

children.title: Newline Before Semicolon
children.description: Places semicolon on separate line.

children.title: Parameter
children.description: Specifies parameter values to fill in for placeholders inside SQL.

children.title: Parameter Types
children.description: Specifies parameter types to support when parsing SQL prepared statements.

children.title: node-sql-parser
children.description: Options for node-sql-parser

children.title: Language
children.description: Specifies the SQL dialect to use.

children.title: Type
children.description: Specifies whether to focus on tables or columns for parsing and formatting in SQL queries.

children.title: prettier-plugin-java
children.description: Java formatter plugin for Prettier

children.title: prettier-plugin-properties
children.description: Prettier plugin for .properties files

children.title: Escape Non-Latin-1 Characters
children.description: Escape with \u all non-Latin-1 characters, to allow safely encoding output as ISO-8859-1.

children.title: Key Separator
children.description: Set the separator to use between a property key and its value.

children.title: prettier-plugin-nginx
children.description: NGINX configuration files formatter plugin for Prettier

children.title: Align Directives
children.description: Align directive parameters within a block to the same column.

children.title: Align Universally
children.description: Align all directive parameters within a file to the same column.

children.title: Wrap Parameters
children.description: Wrap parameters to new lines to fit print width.

children.title: Continuation Indent
children.description: Additional indentation for wrapped lines.

children.title: Format on Save
children.description: Automatically format documents when they are saved.

children.title: Ignore Without Config
children.description: When enabled, documents without a Prettier configuration file will not be formatted on save.

children.title: Ignore Remote Documents
children.description: When enabled, remote documents will be ignored during format on save.

children.title: Ignored Syntaxes
children.description: Documents that are set to an ignored syntax will not be formatted when saved.
